Text: Fwd TradeSpark Power Cash Products Functional ATTENTION Intra month cash traders on TRADESPARK Cash Products for all Power locations will be intermittently brought up throughout the morning of Monday October th Beginning Tuesday October th of the cash products for all power locations will be functional and available for trading At this time PJM is fully functional for all cash products Please make sure you have the subscribed to the desired cash products you wish to trade Regards The TradeSpark Team Contacts for assistance TradeSpark Sales Pam Anderson Jeff Linn Buck LaPoint TradeSpark Help Desk CONFIDENTIAL This email including its contents and attachments if any are confidential If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender and immediately delete it You may not disseminate distribute or forward this email message or disclose its contents to anybody else Copyright and any other intellectual property rights in its contents are the sole property of Tradespark Inc Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version Although we routinely screen for viruses addressees should check this email and any attachments for viruses We make no representation or warranty as to the absence of viruses in this email or any attachments Please note that to ensure regulatory compliance and for the protection of our customers and business we may monitor and read emails sent to and from our servers For further important information please see fulldisclaimerhtml

TradeSpark Off Peak Short Term Products for AEP Cinergy and Entergypst ATTENTION POWER TRADERS TradeSpark is pleased to announce effective immediately Off Peak Short Term Products for AEP Cinergy and Entergy are available on the platform You must first subscribe to the instruments to add them to your portfolio The new products are listed in the attached file OffPeak Short Term Productsdoc a Off Peak Next Day b Off Peak Balance of the Month c Off Peak Weekend X d ComEd and TVA will be available shortly If youre setting up a new grid grids maximum selectclick on the tab that you wish to use To add these to an existing or newly setup grid Doubleclick on the heading area Symbol blue background A box will appear wait a few seconds when North American Energy appears click on the sign to open the subscription tree Click on the sign in front of ENGY Highlight the product you wish to subscribe to and in the right hand screen click the checkbox to the left of the Instrument Name Click on all instruments to be viewed go to the next product and repeat you can subscribe to as many different products as you want When your selections are complete click on DONE All new products will appear at the bottom of your page in the order subscribed Drag and drop them to organize your screen If you have setup a new grid and dont have all the buttonscolumns click on the tab for a grid that is setup properly Place your pointer in the middle of the trading screen and right click A new box will appear in the middle of that box click on Choose Column When that box appears click on Apply to All Grids and select OK The new grid will be setup youll need to adjust the column width on the Market and All Markets columns When satisfied remember to SAVE YOUR PORTFOLIO Please refer questions to the sales group Thank You TradeSpark Sales Buck LaPointe Jon Morace Dave Dunlap Alan Schnur OffPeak Short Term Productsdoc CONFIDENTIAL This email including its contents and attachments if any are confidential
